dmca.title: Case ID 132461681 - Notice of Claimed Infringement
dmca.body:
-----Original Message-----
From: MediaSentryCopyrightInfringement
[mailto:copyright2@mediasentry.com] 
Sent: Friday, April 21, 2006 12:46 AM
To: George Poletes
Subject: Case ID 132461681 - Notice of Claimed Infringement

Friday, April 21, 2006


ThePlanet.com Internet Services, Inc.
1333 North Stemmons Freeway
Suite 110
Dallas, TX  75207  US


RE:  Unauthorized Distribution of the Copyrighted Content: Star Wars:
Empire at War


Dear George Poletes:

We are writing this letter on behalf of LucasArts. 

As you may know, LucasArts is the owner of copyright, trademark, patent
and other intellectual property rights and interests in and to the
following: Star Wars: Empire at War.

No one is authorized to perform, exhibit, reproduce, transmit, or
otherwise distribute the above-mentioned work without the express
written permission of LucasArts, which LucasArts has not granted to
69.56.242.242.

We have received information that an individual has utilized the
above-referenced IP address at the noted date and time to offer
downloads of the above-mentioned work.

The attached documentation specifies the location on your network where
the infringement occurred as well as any available identifying
information.

You are thus not only causing LucasArts loss of substantial revenue but
are also indulging in acts of commission and omission warranting
criminal and civil action under the laws of countries who are signatory
to WTO conventions.  

We request that you immediately do the following:

1) Disable access to the individual who has engaged in the conduct
described above; and
2) Terminate any and all accounts that this individual has through you.

By copy of this letter, the owner of the above-referenced Internet site
and/or email account is hereby directed to cease and desist from the
conduct complained of herein.

Please contact us by replying to this email should you have any
questions.

We appreciate your assistance and thank you for your cooperation in this
matter.  In your future correspondence with us, please refer to Case ID
132461681.

Your prompt response is requested.

Respectfully

Marianne Henderson
Enforcement Coordinator
SafeNet, Inc.



------------------------------
Infringement Detail:
Infringing Work: Star Wars: Empire at War
Filename: 
Star.Wars.Empire.At.War.CloneDVD-MiRROR.tar
First Found: 24 Feb 2006 18:56:20 EST (GMT -0500) Last Found: 24 Feb
2006 18:56:20 EST (GMT -0500)
Filesize: 2,097,152k
IP Address: 69.56.242.242
IP Port: 4858
Network: Digarix
Protocol: IRC
Username: carnivores-bt-KinG
